chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info:
Jain Farstrider,
      p. 9 (xi)â€”Hero of recent legend.
      There is a book about him, The Travels
      of Jain Farstrider, that Mat intends to read but
      never has.  The book is quite popular with his friends, including
      Elayne, Egwene,
      Rand, and Nynaeve.
      See
      Charin, Jain.
Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
